Title: No customer Service Available
Experience Date: No customer Service AvailableThey have an offer called "Welcome", where they offer €100 for new account opening if referred by someone using the code. But that's a scam. It does not work. I opened a boursorama account with my friend's referral and I did not receive any money. And their customer service is bad. Nobody responds to your email. There's no ticketing system for your complaints. So you're on your own if something goes wrong. Better go for some bank which office physically exists, rather than a virtual bank. Boursorama is not safe because no customer service. NOBODY REPLIES TO YOUR EMAIL. Please DO NOT open boursorama bank account. There's no customer service whatsoever.Date of experience: October 29, 2023

Title: Arnaque / Mauvaise fois à la clôture de banque
Experience Date: Arnaque / Mauvaise fois à la clôture de banqueBeware when closing your bank account at Boursorama ! They will suggest you to instead just "suspend" it so it can be easily reactivated later and so you can get notified in case of direct debit attempt on your account. But where they stick it to you is when they bill you for these direct debit requests (that are refused anyway), something that cannot happen on a definitely closed account And obviously, if you need to close your account for good you will have to pay these fees... Bad faith/theftDate of experience: October 18, 2023

Title: Useless if you use a VPN
Experience Date: Useless if you use a VPNUseless if you use a VPN since you cannot login nor verify online payments. Sure, it's for our "protection"...but that "protection" is not optional...sounds familiar?All in all, an online bank for people with an offline mentality.Date of experience: October 11, 2023

Title: Blocking Revolut
Experience Date: Blocking RevolutThey decided to block Revolut because it is an online bank. Kind of hypocritical from an online bank as Boursorama is. So for travellers who use Revolut, do not come to Boursorama.Date of experience: September 26, 2023

Title: New customer lost - terrible customer service
Experience Date: New customer lost - terrible customer serviceAbsolutely terrible customer service. Their agents are rude and incompetent. I tried to open an investment (PEA) account with them over 5 times (wasted 1 month in total) and my file got rejected every single time with no further explanation other than 'try again'. Honestly, for an online bank, they really have no idea how to manage an online business. Seems they invest too much in marketing but zero in customer care. Start by training your customer service agents better! By the way, I opened my PEA with SAXO BANQUE -super easy and everything was set up in less than 3 days. I'm glad I didn't become a client of Boursorama in the end.Date of experience: July 03, 2023

Title: Not impressed.
Experience Date: Not impressed.Not impressed at all by the way the bank tries to foist a different card on you, making your choice for you (with extra charges inevitable) in the announcement that the old one needs renewing. To revert to the same card, with which I am very happy, took half a dozen pages to view and answer questions. Hopeless, waste of my time.It should seek to target its customers instead. There was no way I was going to take up the new card---that was obvious through my spending and transfer history.Aaaaggghh.Date of experience: February 02, 2023

Title: Bugs and terrible customer service
Experience Date: Bugs and terrible customer serviceI've lived in France, the States, and Taiwan. Over the past thirty years, I can recall having had seven banks. Of these banks, Boursorama is the absolute worst. Their customer service is a joke: You have to dig through menu after menu to send them an email, and then they send you a copy-pasted answer a bot could have sent -- and probably did. And that's just my most recent experience. In the past, when you could still hope to receive an answer that wasn't prewritten, I also had the joy of experiencing the life of a hot potato, with each representative dropping my case after one message so that the next representative could start again from scratch (and often contradict what the previous representative had told me to do).And since I live in Taiwan right now, I cannot even open an account in another French bank. I'm stuck and they know it.Date of experience: April 19, 2023

Title: How I am supposed to pay with my VISA?
Experience Date: How I am supposed to pay with my VISA?Last VISA payment attempt: the amount (<35€) is on my account (even if the card is in credit mode), the payment limit is way far from being reached... still rejected.This is now the third time in a row (of 72 hours) that I am not able to pay (online) with my VISA issued by Boursorama, although I have used the confirmation with double checking process using their App, and I even tried with connecting to my account on a computer and receiving an SMS... rejected, tell me why please!I tried Eliott from the web service, this is the most useless and stupid piece of software that exists, it has not clue and keep looping on some obvious nonsense or this that can be read in the support documents and FAQ (let you feel stupid, keep your documents sorted you don't need this tool).I have tried phoning... or being called back to be accurate, guess what is answering: Eliott... you can listen to its stupid nonsense, assuming you did not get the looping message while reading the first time.The number behind the card is for insurance purpose only, so I bothered someone for nothing... BUT IT WAS A ACTUAL PERSON, pleasant and kind too, thanks madam!Be aware: you cannot even block the card phoning there, very surprising (as all the other banks I know are offering that).This specific point is the first part of the reason why I am writing this review.Second is that I wrote a message 72h ago using the contact form on my customer account on their website and have not received any answer back (just a confirmation of sending the message, which was correctly done with a copy of my original message and questions)...So please guys tell me why it is not working, with all the confirmation techniques and methods I tried?How to proceed to use my money?P.S. the "Cruise API" is returning an error code: CSC 7200058, if it helps?Last but not least: how do I speak with somebody?Best RegardsDate of experience: August 26, 2023

Title: The Boursorama customer service is going down the drain
Experience Date: The Boursorama customer service is going down the drainI used to be very satisfied with this online bank and I have been a client of Boursorama for many years, but recently, the quality of the service has seriously deteriorated. I need to make an urgent bank transfer abroad. For security reasons, Boursorama has blocked the various bank transfer requests I made online. Consequently, I sent them an email through their portal asking for support, so the transfer could be made. While I got a notification acknowledging that my email had been received and that I will receive a confirmation to my email address, I never received such a confirmation. Furthermore, when I check on their website the history of my requests, I can see that the email request that I sent to them does not appear. I have tried to call the customer service several times and each time I got connected to a completely useless robot. As a last resort, I have requested to be called back. So far, no one has called me back. The bank transfer is urgent and I am completely stuck with a non existing customer service. The next step will be for me to close my bank account.Date of experience: November 24, 2022

Title: Highly unprofessional and disrespectful bank
Experience Date: Highly unprofessional and disrespectful bankI am a client of Boursorama bank since June 2019, and I have recently applied to open LIVRET A for my two sons (one who was born in France, and other who was born in Pakistan). During the submission process, I was asked to upload the birth certificates which I did. For the one born in France, there was no issue as it was a birth certificate issued in France. However, for other, I received the following email with following point- l'acte de naissance est incomplet, la date et le lieu de naissance des parents sont absents du document. merci de nous faire parvenir une copie complète du livret de famille ou une copie complète de l'acte de naissance avec filiation de Muhammad et une copie du passeport du représentant légalThe issue is that the birth certificates issued in Pakistan have only the names of Parents and do not have dates and places of birth of Parents. Given that in Pakistan a document similar to livret famille does not exist, I have always provided this certificate to receive official documents for my son (Prefecture, Impots, etc) and have never faced an issue. However, to address this problem, I provided (parents) marriage certificate, our titre de sejour, our passports, etc to provide the proof and date of birth of parents. Given that, i am an existing client (and Boursorama has all my information) I did hope that this info will be fine. However, to my surprise, two days later I received a refusal for an account opening for my elder son. Anyways, I got a pseudo livret famille from the Embassy of Pakistan in Paris and reapplied. Again in a couple of days, i got a refusal.This whole episode is very strange for me. Because I do not understand why a DISCRIMINATION is being applied to one child and there is no issue for the other. Is it only because one has a birth certificate issued by a Town Hall in France while the other holds a birth certificate from Pakistan? Just to let you know the same birth certificate was accepted also by the ministry of interior of France. Therefore, i seriously wonder, if a document that is accepted all over, a bank is not willing to consider (and despite all extra parent-related information that was provided)Getting Livret A is not rocket science and i can get it with any bank (My other account is with BNP Paribas and they are after my life to get these plans for my children). After that i tried reaching out to multiple departments but all in vain. Yesterday, I received a letter from one Mr MEZARD. It is amazing how much attention is given to the details because the letter mentioned the reason as - application de nos conditions generals - but did not have the courtesy to specify what precisely is the CONDITION we did not fulfill. But that is because there is NO REAL CONDITION. It is just profile discrimination (possibly racism?) given that there are different documents (the one that had a French birth certificate had the account open vs. the other child having a foreign document). Anyways I have initiated the account opening with BNP Parisbas (Thank god they have the brains to relate). Of course, I will contact Banque de France but to launch a full-scale complaint and audit of the processes. I am also progressing with closure of my account and my suggestion to everyone will be to STAY AWAY from such a discorteous and disrecpectful bank with a useless customer serviceDate of experience: September 04, 2022

Title: Boursorama claims to be an easy to deal…
Experience Date: Boursorama claims to be an easy to deal…Mise à jour:Boursorama, non content de recevoir un avis client négatif, l'a dénoncé à Trustpilot comme "non basé sur une expérience réelle". Or, cette expérience est bien réelle, et calamiteuse. Ce procédé de dénonciation par Boursorama est au mieux malhonnête. Un conseil : améliorez votre service si vous ne souhaitez pas recevoir d'avis négatifs.Boursorama claims to be an easy to deal with bank. Well, not if you're a non resident... But it's not all. here are a couple of examples:- Opening an account : as a non-resident, you need to provide some tax documents. Guess what: Boursorama does not recognize the official tax return form issued by the tax authorities. Customer service is useless : an other department said "not accepted". Then you get cryptic messages : to continue your opening process you need to submit other documents... which are not specified. When you connect to the website, you can't upload them. So you call the customer service who tells you to send it by email. And then, black hole...In the meantime, you may receive a SMS saying that you need to transfer 300€ to the account to validate its opening. Guess what, despite doing this, the account may not be created. Then you need to wait for the 300€ to be returned and you stat over.- Customer service : very uneven. Some assistants are good and polite, others take you for granted and are the limit of being disrespectful. Explanations on when you receive a message, for what, are less than clear. Latest in date : received an SMS announcing my account is open, and I will get an email with my credentials. (after 3 weeks struggling with the customer service). I receive an email about credit of a bonus. But no credential. Call to customer service : we send credentials 48 hours after announcing your account is open. Ooooh. Thanks for being so clear in your communication!So all in all, the first experience has been a disaster. Let's see how the operations go... Wish me luck.Date of experience: July 06, 2022

Experience Date: I've started to use Boursorama bank in…I've started to use Boursorama bank in France 4 weeks ago.
